review.title: “Analyzing India's largest network of Common Service Centers”
review.pros: Pros – Joy of bringing empowerment to rural India. Contributing to nation building. Variety of unique challenges - no single concern is like another. Enough scope for experimentation. Access to the vastly untapped rural markets. Taking technology to the last mile.
review.cons: Cons – Franchisee model. Diversified challenges worsened at times by the sheer vastness of dialects, cultures, economies, etc. Involves huge investments in manpower. Difficult to implement practices from other industries like FMCG.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
